Title: Think Like a Dog
Produced by:
Cory Chen 
 Andrew Lazar 
 Linshu Zhang
Starring:
Megan Fox 
 Gabriel Bateman 
 Josh Duhamel 
 Kunal Nayyar 
 Todd Stashwick
Production companies:
M-Star International 
 Mad Chance 
 120dB Films 
 Ingenious Media
Plot: A 12-year-old tech prodigy's science experiment goes awry, and he forges a telepathic connection with his dog. The duo joins forces and uses their unique perspectives on life to comically overcome complications of family and school.
Cast: Todd Stashwick as the voice of Henry
Production: It was announced in September 2016 that Gil Junger would be writing and directing the film, with Andrew Lazar producing.

No further announcements on the film were made until March 2018, with the castings of Megan Fox and Josh Duhamel. Filming began in New Orleans in May, with Gabriel Bateman, Janet Montgomery, Julia Jones, Kunal Nayyar and Bryan Callen added to the cast.
Release: Think Like a Dog was released through Premium VOD by Lionsgate on June 9, 2020.
Reception: As of October 2021, the film holds a 70% approval rating on Rotten Tomatoes, based on 10 reviews, with an average rating of 6.1/10.
